title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Collaborative Teaching Strategies in Remote and Blended Learning Environments: Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics curriculum knowledge, basic digital tool proficiency, and teacher leadership experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement at least three technology integration strategies for collaborative instruction in blended/remote environments
Participants can facilitate at least two small-group mathematics activities using smartphone-based tools (video conferencing, collaboration platforms, etc.)
Participants can collaboratively develop at least one consistent mathematics instruction plan for students with special educational needs with peer educators

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
